name: Rydzeski v. Kiskiminetas Valley Coal Co. (et al., Appellant)
name_abbreviation: Rydzeski v. Kiskiminetas Valley Coal Co.

parties: Rydzeski v. Kiskiminetas Valley Coal Co. (et al., Appellant).

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Me. Justice Sadlee,
The same facts and legal questions are involved in this appeal as in Malky v. Kiskiminetas Valley Coal Company, defendant, Pennsylvania Bituminous Mutual Assn., insurance carrier, appellant, this day decided, and a like determination is made.
The judgment is affirmed.
opinions.author: Me. Justice Sadlee,

casebody.head_matter:
Rydzeski v. Kiskiminetas Valley Coal Co. (et al., Appellant).
Argued October 8, 1923.
Appeal, No. 156, Oct. T., 1923, by Pennsylvania Bituminous Mutual Association, insurance carrier, from judgment of C. P. Allegheny Co., July T., 1923, No. 890, affirming decision of Workmen’s Compensation Board, in case of Mildred Rydzeski v. Kiskiminetas Valley Coal Co., defendant, and Pennsylvania Bituminous Mutual Association, insurance carrier.
January 7, 1924:
